======Enables dead marine/marines respawn for lobby leader======
= Description =

Dead marine/marines can be respawned in game for fun.

[[asw_respawn_marine.wiki|asw_respawn_marine]] is exclusively used for admin, also lobby leader is allowed to use the command if asw_respawn_marine_enable is enabled.
